txt.en: 'That accounts for everyone. They will be safe in Vegbár under Skalla's protection. Now we can focus our attention on the goblin threat itself!'
'Oh my! We must get to Vegbár!'

'There are other Woodmen living in this area that are now in danger, [placeholder]. They must be warned that the goblins have come down from the mountains and are moving south! I fear that the next time the goblins decide to strike, the Woodmen will not be as lucky as Ainhard.'
'Goblins?! Do you think I can bring my animals to Vegbár?'

'There are other Woodmen living in this area that are now in danger, [placeholder]. They must be warned that the goblins have come down from the mountains and are moving south! I fear that the next time the goblins decide to strike, the Woodmen will not be as lucky as Ainhard.'
Other Woodmen in the Wolf-denes need to be warned of the goblin threat. Send them to Vegbár before they fall victim.
The Woodmen Begga, Evrul, Gudule, and Hodver live in the Wolf-denes, south of Vegbár.\n\nYou should find them and send them to safety before the goblins come for them!
'That accounts for everyone. They will be safe in Vegbár under Skalla's protection. Now we can focus our attention on the goblin threat itself!'

'There are other Woodmen living in this area that are now in danger, [placeholder]. They must be warned that the goblins have come down from the mountains and are moving south! I fear that the next time the goblins decide to strike, the Woodmen will not be as lucky as Ainhard.'
'What? Goblins? I will head to Vegbár as soon as I can!'

Langhár can be summoned to your side with Langhár's summoning horn.

You should talk to Langhár.

If Langhár is no longer with you, she may be outside Waldfast or in Vegbár.
'That accounts for everyone. They will be safe in Vegbár under Skalla's protection. Now we can focus our attention on the goblin threat itself!'
'I am getting out of here! Do something about the goblins!'
